ej,sprir001,P,vanol901,Intentional HBP ej,larut101,M,vanol901,Arguing Springer's ejection Cardinals pitcher Russ Springer ejected by HP umpire Larry Vanover; manager Tony La Russa ran out to argue the ejection, breaking his sunglasses during the discussion and eventually was ejected by Vanover

ej,oquej001,C,vanol901,Arguing that Seanez should be ejected Cardinals Third Base Coach Jose Oquendo ejected by HP umpire Larry Vanover for arguing that Phillies pitcher Rudy Seanez should have been ejected for throwing a pitch behind Brendan Ryan; manager Tony La Russa confronted the umpires near the Phillies clubhouse after the game
$big collision at the plate, Molina held ball for out, left on backboard with neck brace; taken to hospital with mild concussion
$Duncan was called out at 1B because of batter interference by Looper after his swing
$routine fly ball that DeJesus lost in the sun
$Kennedy tried to barehand the ball but mishandled it before throwing to 1B
Debut game for Argenis Reyes
$Pujols fielded ball near bag, stepped on base for first out. Kouzmanoff started for 2nd, stopped and was tagged out about 10 feet from base to complete DP
ej,yoste001,M,rapue901,Checked swing $Prince Fielder called out on a check swing; Brewers Manager Ned Yost ejected by HP umpire Ed Rapuano
$Carlos Ruiz called for interference
$Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina was in the original lineup but was scratched before the national anthem due to a left foot contusion
Cardinals left fielder Brian Barton left the game due to an injured chest
Brewers second baseman Ray Durham left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder

Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina left the game due to an injured leg
